assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)

description.en: The programme includes reading and working on scientific literature (topic include, e.g. studying at university, special educational needs, assessment, 21st century skills), learning presentation techniques and  structure and parts of a research article and essay. Students will make a presentation based on a scientific article and write a research essay.
description.et: Kursuse käigus töötatakse erinevate haridusalaste tekstidega (õppimine ülikoolis, hariduslikud erivajadused, hindamine, 21.sajandi õpioskused jne), õpitakse tundma teadusartikli struktuuri ja osi, kirjutama esseed ja koostama suulist ettekannet.

objectives.en: To enlarge students' vocabulary and develop language skills on C1 language level to work independently on scientific literature.
objectives.et: Rikastada üliõpilaste sõnavara ja keelelisi oskusi C1 keeletasemel töötamaks iseseisvalt erialase kirjandusega

learning_outcomes.en: After successful completion of the course students will know the main terminology to understand education-related texts on C1 language level; discuss orally and in written educational topics; be able to paraphrase and summarise texts and know the requirements for referencing; know the structure of research articles; know the structure of a research essay; devise and write an essay according to the requirements; use suitable presentation techniques to deliver a presentation; analyse oral presentation of their peers.
